data.title: Karan Singh Grover
data.meta_description: Karan Singh Grover (Born on February 23, 1982) is an Indian television actor and model. He began his television career with Kitni Mast Hai Zindagi on MTV India. Karan is famous for playing the popular characters of Dr. Armaan Mallik in Dill Mill Gayye on Star One and Asad Ahmed Khan in Zee TV's...
data.text:
Karan Singh Grover (Born on February 23, 1982) is an Indian television actor and model. He began his television career with Kitni Mast Hai Zindagi on MTV India. Karan is famous for playing the popular characters of Dr. Armaan Mallik in Dill Mill Gayye on Star One and Asad Ahmed Khan in Zee TV's show Qubool Hai.

Personal life[]

Karan Singh Grover was born on February 23, 1982 in Delhi, India to a Punjabi Sikh family hailing from Ambala, Haryana. He has one younger brother Ishmeet Singh. During his childhood, Karan and his family moved to Al Khobar, Saudi Arabia, he studied at International Indian School Dammam. In 2000, he moved back to Mumbai and pursued a degree in Hotel Management from IHM Mumbai, Dadar Catering College. He was in a band during his college days called the Thousand Decibels. After completing his degree, Karan moved to Muscat, Oman where his family was located and started working at the Sheraton Hotel as a marketing executive for about a year. He later returned to India to pursue a career in modeling and participated in the Gladrags Mega Model Manhunt contest in 2004. He won the award for the Most Popular Model. Karan married Jennifer Winget, his friend and co-star from Dill Mill Gayye, in a private ceremony on April 9, 2012. Grover divorce Jennifer Winget in November 2014 and get married with actress bollywood Bipasha Basu in 30th april 2016 AND PRESENT

[]

i

Career[]

Before starting his television acting career, Karan did many modeling assignments, ramp shows, advertisements and even hosted a radio show. Later, he entered the Gladrags Mega Model Manhunt Contest in 2004 and ended up winning the award for the Most Popular Model. Through a nationwide talent hunt contest he, along with five others, got selected to play leads in an MTV show Kitni Mast Hai Zindagi, followed by Princess Dollie Aur Uska Magic Bag.

He was also seen in Kasautii Zindagii Kay in a negative role.The show gained him good popularity among fans.He is still remembered for his role in the serial. Subsequently, he acted in Solhah Singaarr on Sahara One, as well as some short stints on C.I.D. (Indian TV series) and Parrivaar. Karan fame furthered through the role of Dr. Armaan Mallik in Dill Mill Gaye, which became widely popular and gained him a massive fan base. Along with Dill Mill Gayye, he anchored the STAR One reality television show Zara Nachke Dikha throughout its first season. He was the second runner-up in the dance reality show Jhalak Dikhhla Jaa in Season 3.

In 2009, he co-hosted the music show Idea Rocks India on Colors TV. In 2010 he participated as a contestant in Fear Factor: Khatron Ke Khiladi (season 3). In 2011 he hosted the traveling reality show Perfect Couple on Channel V. Also made a special guest appearance for about a month of the Channel V series Dil Dosti Dance as professor Karan Mallik. He also starred in a telefilm in the Star Plus telefilm series Teri Meri Love Stories in August 2012. Currently, Karan is working in a new popular show Qubool Hai as Asad Ahmed Khan on Zee TV.

Television[]

Year Serial Role Channel Notes 2004–2005 Kitni Mast Hai Zindagi Arnav Deol MTV India Karan's debut serial. One of main leads of the show opposite Panchi Bora, Barkha Bisht & Mansi Parekh. 2005 Princess Dollie Aur Uska Magic Bag Aman Star Plus Fantasy Show. He played main lead Dollie's love interest for a little while opposite Karishma Randeva. 2005-2006 Kasautii Zindagii Kay Sharad Gupta Star Plus Initially a positive role opposite Jennifer Winget their characters get married and later his role turns negative. 2006–2007 Solhah Singaarr Abhimanyu Sahara One Initially, it was the role of the main lead opposite character of Meera played by Akangsha Rawat. But, later the story changed as Meera got married. His character re-entered the show in mid-2007 again for a little while and then exited in August, 2007. 2007 C.I.D. Rahul and Sameer(Sid) Sony TV Only in two episodes Case of the Invisible Killer as Rahul & Body in Mid Air as Sid. 2007 Parrivaar Adhiraj Shergill Zee TV Only in the show for about a week as the main lead left it for Dill Mill Gayye and character's face was changed. 2007–2010 Dill Mill Gayye Season 1 & 2 Dr. Armaan Mallik STAR One Main lead in Season 1 as intern and season 2 as Senior doctor opposite Shilpa Anand, Sukirti Kandpal & Jennifer Winget. 2008 Nach Baliye 3 Himself Star Plus Special dance Performance in one Episode with Shraddha Nigam. 2008 The Global Indian Film and Television Honours Himself 9X Special dance Performance with Shilpa Anand. 2008 Zara Nachke Dikha Season 1 Host STAR One Co-hosted the 1st season of the show with Shweta Gulati. 2009 Jhalak Dikhhla Jaa Season 3 Himself Sony TV Dance reality show Second runner-up in Season 3. 2009 Idea Rocks India Host Colors TV Musical reality show Co-hosted the show with Mansi Parekh. 2010 Fear Factor – Khatron Ke Khiladi Level 3 Himself Colors TV Contestant in the show in Season 3 in Brazil. 2011 Perfect Couple Host Channel V Host of the travelling reality show. 2011 Gladrags Mega Model Manhunt Himself Channel V As Guest Judge for two episodes. 2011 Dil Dosti Dance Professor Karan Mallik Channel V Guest role as a student counselor for about a month. 2012 Teri Meri Love Stories Raghuvir Star Plus Third telefilm titled Ek nano si love story, Main lead opposite Anita Hassanandani. 2012–2013 Qubool Hai Asad Ahmed Khan Zee TV Lead Actor opposite Surbhi Jyoti in a show based on Muslim family. 2012 Zee Rishtey Awards Himself Zee TV Special dance performance with Surbhi Jyoti & Rishabh Sinha.

Filmography[]

Year Title Role Notes 2008 Bhram Minor role as Carlton, one of the friends of the main lead. 2012 I am 24 Minor Role as Aman Singh, Completed since 2008, Released August 30, 2012, small comic role. 2012 Lorie/The Loving Doll Male Lead as Arjun Kapoor, Currently under post production, co-star Diana Hayde and director Pavan Kaul. 2015 Alone Male Lead as Kabir u Hate Story 3 Male Lead as Saurab Singhaniaa

Awards & Nominations[]

Year Award Result Award function Notes 2004 Most Popular Model Award Won Gladrags Manhunt Contest 2007 Most Promising Actor Won Kalakar Awards Kalakar Awards Foundation Kolkatta 2008 GR8 Face Male Of The Year Won Indian Television Academy Awards ITA Awards(Indian Television Academy Awards) for Dill Mill Gayye as Doctor Armaan. 2008 Best Actor(Male) Nominated Indian Telly Awards for Dill Mill Gayye as Doctor Armaan. 2008 Best Anchor Nominated Indian Telly Awards Zara Nachke Dikha season 1 with Shweta Gulati. 2010 Most Fit Actor(Male) Nominated Zee Gold Awards 2012 Favorite Naya Sadasya Won Zee Rishtey Awards as Asad Ahmed Khan for Qubool Hai 2012 Favorite Bhai Won Zee Rishtey Awards as Asad Ahmed Khan for Qubool Hai with Rishabh Sinha 2013 TV Personality of the year Won Indian Telly Awards 2013 Best Actor Won Boroplus Gold awards for Qubool Hai 2013 Best onscreen couple Won Boroplus Gold Awards with Surbhi Jyoti for Qubool Hai

Appearances[]

Year Show Notes 2010 Boroplus Gold Awards Presenting an Award with Jennifer Winget 2010 Pearl Wave II concert Presenting an Award to Rashmi Desai 2011 Jhalak Dikhhla Jaa 4 As a guest in one of the episodes supporting Chang 2012 Zee Rishtey Awards Special Dance performance with Surbhi Jyoti & Rishabh Sinha 2013 Holi Ladakhpan Ki Special Dance performance for Holi special with Surbhi Jyoti 2013 Indian Telly Awards Presenting two awards with Jennifer Winget
